net.jini.core.transaction.server

Interface TransactionConstants

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NestableTransactionManager, OutriggerServer, Transactable, TransactionManager, TransactionParticipant, TxnLogRecord, TxnManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbortJob, AbortRecord, ActivatableMahaloImpl, CommitJob, CommitRecord, ConstrainableParticipantProxy, ConsumingWatcher, EntryHandle, EntryHolder, NonActivatableMahaloImpl, OutriggerServerImpl, OutriggerServerWrapper, ParticipantAbortRecord, ParticipantCommitRecord, ParticipantHandle, ParticipantModRecord, ParticipantProxy, PersistentOutriggerImpl, PrepareAndCommitJob, PrepareAndCommitRecord, PrepareJob, PrepareRecord, SettlerTask, TakeIfExistsWatcher, TakeMultipleWatcher, TransactableAvailabilityWatcher, TransactableEventWatcher, TransactableReadIfExistsWatcher, TransientMahaloImpl, TransientOutriggerImpl, Txn, TxnConstants, TxnManagerImpl, TxnManagerTransaction, TxnMgrProxy, TxnMgrProxy.ConstrainableTxnMgrProxy, TxnMonitorTask

    public interface TransactionConstants
    Constants common to transaction managers and participants.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sun Microsystems, Inc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ABORTED
      Transaction has been aborted.
      static int ACTIVE
      Transaction is currently active.
      static int COMMITTED
      Transaction has been committed.
      static int NOTCHANGED
      Transaction has been prepared with nothing to commit.
      static int PREPARED
      Transaction has been prepared but not yet committed.
      static int VOTING
      Transaction is determining if it can be committed.
